Grooming Elegance Redefined

Our Beard Grooming Kit contains:
30ml beard Oil, 100ml Beard Shampoo, Wooden Comb and 60ml Beard Balm.

See more information below

settings.title: Revolutionize Your Beard Care
settings.text:
Grooming Reinvented
Perfect for beginners and enthusiasts alike, the Beard Grooming Kit is your all-in-one solution.


Exceptional Value, Exceptional Beard
Get top-notch quality, stylish presentation, and significant savings with this remarkable kit.

settings.title: 1. Beard and Bones 30ml Beard Oil
settings.text:
30ml Beard Oil is a unique product that comes in a stylish glass skull-shaped bottle.

With a choice of six available scents, this beard oil is perfect for those who want to keep their facial hair looking and smelling great.

Each Grooming Kit comes with 30ml Beard Oil in the matching scent.

settings.title: 2. Beard and Bones 100ml Beard Shampoo
settings.text:
100ml Beard Shampoo is a premium product that helps keep your beard clean, soft, and healthy.

Made with high-quality ingredients, this beard shampoo is perfect for men who want to maintain a well-groomed and stylish look.

Kreed Grooming kit = Kreed Shampoo

Savage Grooming Kit = Savage shampoo

Invictors Grooming Kit = Invictors Shampoo

All other grooming kits = Unscented Shampoo

settings.title: 3. Beard and Bones 60ml Beard Balm
settings.text:
60ml Beard Balm is a must-have for men who want to keep their beard soft and manageable.

This premium beard balm is made with natural ingredients that help nourish and protect the beard, while also adding volume and shine to it.

Each Grooming Kit comes with 60ml Beard Balm in the matching scent.

settings.title: 4. Beard and Bones Wooden comb
settings.text:
Material: Made of high-quality, durable wood material

Dual Purpose: The dual-purpose comb is perfect for both wet and dry hair, making it an ideal tool for use during a shower or styling routine.

 Eco-Friendly: The comb is made from sustainable and renewable resources, making it a more environmentally friendly alternative to plastic combs

settings.title: Mastering Beard Excellence
settings.text:
Ultimate Beard Care Solution
Upgrade your grooming routine with the comprehensive Beard Grooming Kit from Beard and Bones.


All-Inclusive Mastery
This kit features a 100ml Beard Shampoo, 60ml Beard Balm, 30ml Beard Oil, and a Wooden Comb, ensuring your beard is always in top shape.

settings.title: Scented Symphonies for Your Beard
settings.text:
Scented Sophistication
Indulge in an array of appealing scents that complement your unique style.


Fragrant Harmony
Experience a harmonious blend of scents with matching options in Beard Shampoo, Beard Balm, and Beard Oil.
